```{r load and aggregate scRNA data}
             "N2_EV_chr","N2_ints11_chr","tfiis_EV_chr","tfiis_ints11_chr")


library(reshape2)
library(dplyr)

motifdep_piRNA_precursors_data_summary<-lapply(motifdep_piRNA_precursors_agg,function(df){
  number_seqs<-aggregate(df[,"V12"],by=list(df[,"V12"]),FUN=length)
  median_length<-aggregate(df[,"V4"],by=list(df[,"V12"]),FUN=median)
  mean_length<-aggregate(df[,"V4"],by=list(df[,"V12"]),FUN=mean)
  
  number_reads<-aggregate(df[,"x"],by=list(df[,"V12"]),FUN=sum)
  df_uncol<-df[rep(row.names(df), df$x),]
  median_length_numreads<-aggregate(df_uncol[,"V4"],by=list(df_uncol[,"V12"]),FUN=median)
  mean_length_numreads<-aggregate(df_uncol[,"V4"],by=list(df_uncol[,"V12"]),FUN=mean)

  merged<-data.frame(number_seqs$x,
                   median_length$x,
                   mean_length$x,
                   number_reads$x,
                   median_length_numreads$x,
                   mean_length_numreads$x)
  colnames(merged)<-c("number_seqs","median_length","mean_length","number_reads","median_length_numreads","mean_length_numreads")
  rownames(merged)<-number_seqs$Group.1
  return(merged)
})


merged_df<-motifdep_piRNA_precursors_data_summary[[1]]
colnames(merged_df)<-paste0(names_agg[1],colnames(merged_df))
for (i in seq(2,length(names_agg))){
  df<-motifdep_piRNA_precursors_data_summary[[i]]
  colnames(df)<-paste0(names_agg[i],colnames(df))
  merged_df<-merge(merged_df,df,by=0,all=TRUE)
  rownames(merged_df)<-merged_df$Row.names
  merged_df$Row.names<-NULL
}
```

```{r 3prime cap and 5prime degradation fragment positions}

path_fragments<-"/Users/ab6415/Documents/Work_laptop_stuff/Bioinformatics/Analysis/INTEGRATOR_PAPER_ANALYSES/Fig4_FigS5_degradationfragments/fragment_length_and_abundance_analysis/"
fragments<- list.files(path=path_fragments, pattern="*distance") 
fragments<-paste0(path_fragments,fragments)
fragments_names <-c("N2_EV2","N2_ints11_RNAi2","TFIIS_EV2","N2_EV1","TFIIS_ints11_RNAi2","N2_ints11_RNAi1","TFIIS_EV1","TFIIS_ints11_RNAi1")
          
fragment_data <- lapply(fragments,function(i){
  read.table(file=i,sep="\t")
})

N2_EV<-rbind(fragment_data[[1]],fragment_data[[4]])
N2_EV<-aggregate(N2_EV[,"V6"],by=N2_EV[colnames(fragment_data[[1]])[c(1:5,7:15)]],FUN=sum)
N2_ints11<-rbind(fragment_data[[2]],fragment_data[[6]])
N2_ints11<-aggregate(N2_ints11[,"V6"],by=N2_ints11[colnames(fragment_data[[1]])[c(1:5,7:15)]],FUN=sum)
tfiis_EV<-rbind(fragment_data[[3]],fragment_data[[7]])
tfiis_EV<-aggregate(tfiis_EV[,"V6"],by=tfiis_EV[colnames(fragment_data[[1]])[c(1:5,7:15)]],FUN=sum)
tfiis_ints11<-rbind(fragment_data[[5]],fragment_data[[8]])
tfiis_ints11<-aggregate(tfiis_ints11[,"V6"],by=tfiis_ints11[colnames(fragment_data[[1]])[c(1:5,7:15)]],FUN=sum)

fragment_data_agg<-list(N2_EV,N2_ints11,tfiis_EV,tfiis_ints11)
fragments_names_agg <-c("N2_EV","N2_ints11_RNAi","TFIIS_EV","TFIIS_ints11_RNAi")



fragment_distances<-lapply(fragment_data_agg,function(df){
  df$distance<-df$V2-df$V10
  df$distance[which(as.character(df$V8)=="-")]<-df$distance[which(df$V8=="-")]*(-1)
  df$distance<-df$distance+2
  return(df[which(df$distance<100 & df$distance>15),])})


fragment_distances_bylocus<-lapply(fragment_distances,function(df){
    median_distance_collapsed<-aggregate(df[,"distance"],by=list(df[,"V12"]),FUN=median)
    mean_distance_collapsed<-aggregate(df[,"distance"],by=list(df[,"V12"]),FUN=mean)
    
    df_uncol<-df[rep(row.names(df), df$x),]
    median_distance_uncollapsed<-aggregate(df_uncol[,"distance"],by=list(df_uncol[,"V12"]),FUN=median)
    mean_distance_uncollapsed<-aggregate(df_uncol[,"distance"],by=list(df_uncol[,"V12"]),FUN=mean)
    
    merged<-data.frame( median_distance_collapsed$x,
                        mean_distance_collapsed$x,
                        median_distance_uncollapsed$x,
                        mean_distance_uncollapsed$x)
  colnames(merged)<-c("median_distance_col","mean_distance_col","median_distance_uncol","mean_distance_uncol")
  rownames(merged)<-median_distance_collapsed$Group.1
  return(merged)
})

fragments_df_merged<-fragment_distances_bylocus[[1]]
colnames(fragments_df_merged)<-paste0(fragments_names_agg[1],colnames(fragments_df_merged))
for (i in seq(2,length(fragments_names_agg))){
  df<-fragment_distances_bylocus[[i]]
  colnames(df)<-paste0(fragments_names_agg[i],colnames(df))
  fragments_df_merged<-merge(fragments_df_merged,df,by=0,all=TRUE)
  rownames(fragments_df_merged)<-fragments_df_merged$Row.names
  fragments_df_merged$Row.names<-NULL
}

colnames(fragments_df_merged)


merged_fragments_and_scRNAs<-merge(merged_df,fragments_df_merged,by=0,all=TRUE)
rownames(merged_fragments_and_scRNAs)<-merged_fragments_and_scRNAs$Row.names
merged_fragments_and_scRNAs$Row.names<-NULL
```
